casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2011-0170. U.S. Bank, N.A. v. Perry.

Cuyahoga App. No. 94757, 2010-Ohio-6171. Discretionary appeal accepted; cause held for the decision in 2011-0218, U.S. Bank, N.A. v. Duvall, Cuyahoga App. No. 94174, 2010-Ohio-6478; and briefing schedule stayed.

Pfeifer, J., dissents.
